## Prepare GSMN

```{r, message=FALSE}
file <- system.file("extdata/Example_Coverage/iHY3410_Compound-SBtab.tsv", package = "MetClassNetR")

conn <- classyfireR::open_cache("/home/sscharfe/R packages/MetClassNetR/20210804_classyfireR.db")

start <- Sys.time()
network_tibble_2 <- gsmn_to_ontology(file,"chemont", conn=conn)
end <- Sys.time()
print(paste0( "Lasted ",end-start))
#Time difference of 3.012151 hours
#Time difference of 2.97866 hours
```
